room_title: Escape room "Zen Room" by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
review: Our group did the Zen room and it was a blast. The game masters were amazing and also the front of the house was amazing also. I would recommend anyone to try that room it is hard but well worth it! Keep it up guys - you are amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Zen Room" by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
review: Some great tricky rooms. Staff very friendly. Did CSI and Zen, Zen was especially tricky in 60 minutes.
